column5: thought I would share a pic of this monster I landed last week.  I froze my butt off but it was so worth it!

Nice fish.  I put the boat in the water for an hour on Sunday at Bronte.  I was looking for pike but all a saw were bass around the pier and one massive bull head.  Good to see you had better luck than I did
Great spot - even named my Daughter after Bronte - well phonetically correct for an East Mountain Hammer Boy - Bronny
SWEET FISH  i tried bronte this fall with no luck
there is still time! caught a rainbow off the pier last weekend. my first ever RB off the pier.
